data: {"concept_id": "action", "concept_name": "Action", "type": "element", "definition": "Action", "scope_notes": "Use to change state, reposition characters, or deliver consequence; keep only beats that matter.", "axes": "strength_level", "axis_values": "1|2|3", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "pacing|tension|POV", "conflicts_with": "over-choreography|random_filler", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_action_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_action_weak_*", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "signal_id": "sig_l1_micro", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "1", "description": "Micro-movements/idles that color a moment; usually no goal or change.", "detection_hint": "verbs: fidget, glance, adjust, sip", "false_positive_risks": "decorative gesture mistaken for meaningful beat", "minimal_example": "She adjusts her sleeve, eyes on the menu.", "counterexample": "She elbows the fire alarm; sprinklers erupt.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "signal_id": "sig_l2_purpose", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "2", "description": "Sustained, goal-driven movement through space/obstacles.", "detection_hint": "goal verb + path verbs + environment nouns", "false_positive_risks": "over-described path without purpose", "minimal_example": "He shoulders through the crowd toward the door.", "counterexample": "He lists every hallway turn with no reason.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "signal_id": "sig_l3_impact", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "3", "description": "Explosive or decisive action that changes the situation immediately.", "detection_hint": "impact verbs + object state change", "false_positive_risks": "high-energy verbs with zero consequence", "minimal_example": "She kicks the chair; it splinters and blocks the exit.", "counterexample": "She ‘attacks’ but nothing in the scene changes.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "misconception_id": "over_choreo", "description": "Over-choreography slows pace by enumerating limbs and micro-moves.", "tells": "long verb chains; spatial micromanagement; no state change", "likely_causes": "fear of reader confusion; screenplay habit", "corrective_feedback": "Compress to decisive beats that change state; let the reader infer connective tissue.", "micro_drill": "Reduce any 5-step action into 2 state-changing beats.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "misconception_id": "impactless_blast", "description": "High-energy verbs with no consequence (fake Level 3).", "tells": "dramatic motion but scene unchanged", "likely_causes": "confusing ‘intensity’ with ‘impact’", "corrective_feedback": "Force an irreversible outcome: broken object, blocked path, injury, escape.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite the last sentence so the environment or power balance is different.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"concept_id": "action", "misconception_id": "doc_1", "description": "Avoid chaining too many Level 3 beats in a row—this creates fatigue and flattens impact. Break up with Level 2 or Level 1 to let the reader breathe.", "tells": "", "likely_causes": "", "corrective_feedback": "Tighten to consequential beats.", "micro_drill": "Replace 2 gestures with 1 outcome beat.", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_action_identify_level", "concept_id": "action", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label the action beats in the passage as Level 1 (micro), Level 2 (purpose), or Level 3 (impact) and justify each label.", "expected_features": "Each labeled beat cites a signal; Level 3 includes outcome change", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": "{\"Exceeds\": \"Accurate labels + precise signals + outcome proof for L3\", \"Meets\": \"Mostly accurate with minor justifications\", \"Developing\": \"Labels or justifications weak/missing\"}", "distractor_strategy": "Use over-choreo or fake-impact distractors", "hint_steps": "1) Look for goal words 2) Scan for obstacle words 3) Confirm state change", "variation_axes": "setting|POV|stakes", "difficulty": "2", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_action_escalate_rewrite", "concept_id": "action", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Take this Level 1 beat and escalate to Level 2, then Level 3, keeping the same setting and character goal consistent.", "expected_features": "L2 shows purposeful movement; L3 produces irreversible consequence", "scoring_method": "count_features|rubric", "rubric_levels": "{\"Exceeds\": \"Clear goal\\u2192obstacle\\u2192impact chain\", \"Meets\": \"Goal and impact present\", \"Developing\": \"Missing goal or consequence\"}", "distractor_strategy": "Offer a tempting flourish that lacks consequence", "hint_steps": "1) State the goal 2) Introduce resistance 3) Force a change", "variation_axes": "stakes|time_pressure", "difficulty": "3", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_action_diagnose_fix", "concept_id": "action", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "This action paragraph reads muddy. Replace two gestures with decisive beats that change the situation.", "expected_features": "Concise beats; concrete verbs; environment/power shift", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": "{\"Exceeds\": \"Both replacements create clear state change\", \"Meets\": \"One creates change\", \"Developing\": \"No tangible difference\"}", "distractor_strategy": "Insert empty flash to mislead", "hint_steps": "1) Underline verbs 2) Circle nouns that change 3) Cut the rest", "variation_axes": "verbosity|line_length", "difficulty": "2", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_action_5", "concept_id": "action", "axis_value": "2", "label": "medium", "text": "get a character from A to B.", "context_tags": "", "source_md5": "cafe882c0816112ceb5cb8a4cc0df2f7", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T16:33:07.044490Z"}
